title: Turkey burgers

ingredients.content: 1 bread roll, stale and cut into quarters
Â½ tsp freshly ground black pepper

preparations.content: Dice turkey (approx. 2 cm), remove sinews and allow to freeze for approx. 1 hour.
Place pieces of bread roll in mixing bowl and grate <b>10 sec/speed 8<b>.
Add frozen turkey, egg, paprika, mustard, salt, pepper, vegetable broth powder and water, and chop <b>30 sec/speed 7<b> with aid of spatula.
Shape 10 burgers from mixture (or 20 mini meatballs) and fry in hot oil until golden on both sides. Serve hot or cold.

hintsAndTricks: If desired, also chop fresh herbs such as parsley or basil with onion.
